channel.title: Making a item into a shop
channel.description:
ok i just added my santa and now i wanna make him sell ONLY santa hats.
the x coord is: 2656 y: 3305
i want it to have 100 in the shop and for them to cost 1 gp :)
pls post thnx.

item.title: Making a item into a shop
item.dc:creator: @Bluchaos Bluchaos
item.description:
@Bluchaos wrote:

shop = 65	Santa's Shop			2	2	1050	100

in shops.cfg and

spawn = 1552	2902	3554	0	0	0	0	0	0	Santa!

in autospawn.cfg

EDIT
lol you posted right before me…

Read full topic

item.title: Making a item into a shop
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

Open shops.cfg, then find your santa shop, remove all the item ids that are’nt santas and replace them with “0”

( NO brackets round the 0 )

Read full topic

add this

shop = 31	Santa's_Shop					2	2	7336	99999	7462	99999	3105	99999	1048	99999	1050	99999	1038	99999	1040	99999	1042	99999	1044	99999	1046	99999	1037	99999	1057	99999	1055	99999	1053	99999	1961	99999	1959	99999	1187	99999	3140	99999	4087	99999	4585	99999	1149	99999	6858	99999	6860	99999	6862	99999	6856	99999	6859	99999	6861	99999	6863	99999	6857	99999	4084	99999
